column2: Ronald]] and [[Hilary Tolkien]] fall ill with measles.
Mabel Tolkien]] is diagnosed with diabetes.
14]]''' - Mabel Tolkien dies at the age of 34 died after six days in a diabetic coma.
Ronald]] and [[Hilary Tolkien]] move in with their Aunt, [[Beatrice Suffield]].

column1: * '''?''' - After the death of his mother, the guardianship of Tolkien and his brother Hilary is taken over by Father [[Francis Xavier Morgan]], a priest of the [[Birmingham Oratory]].
